# Erc20 class

Standard ERC20 Token functions

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.erc20.transfer(walletAddress, amount);
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                      | Modifiers | Description                                               |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper, storage, chainId)](./sdk.erc20._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Erc20</code> class |

## Methods

| Method                                                                    | Modifiers | Description                                          |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| [allowance(spender)](./sdk.erc20.allowance.md)                            |           | Get token allowance                                  |
| [allowanceOf(owner, spender)](./sdk.erc20.allowanceof.md)                 |           | Get token allowance of a specific wallet             |
| [balance()](./sdk.erc20.balance.md)                                       |           | Get token balance for the currently connected wallet |
| [balanceOf(address)](./sdk.erc20.balanceof.md)                            |           | Get token balance for a specific wallet              |
| [get()](./sdk.erc20.get.md)                                               |           | Get the token metadata                               |
| [getMintTransaction(receiver, amount)](./sdk.erc20.getminttransaction.md) |           | Construct a mint transaction without executing it    |
| [totalSupply()](./sdk.erc20.totalsupply.md)                               |           | Get the total supply for this token                  |

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Erc20<T extends TokenERC20 | DropERC20 | BaseERC20 = BaseERC20 | BaseSignatureMintERC20> implements UpdateableNetwork, DetectableFeature
```

**Implements:** UpdateableNetwork, DetectableFeature

## Remarks

Basic functionality for a ERC20 contract that handles all unit transformation for you.
